abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Showtime television documentary From the Sky Down, directed by Davis Guggenheim, which explores the making of 1991 U2 album Achtung Baby.
snippet: The filmmaker Davis Guggenheim focuses on the making of U2’s acclaimed 1991 album, “Achtung Baby,” in his documentary “From the Sky Down.”
lead_paragraph: The filmmaker Davis Guggenheim focuses on the making of U2’s acclaimed 1991 album, “Achtung Baby,” in his documentary “From the Sky Down.”

headline.main: The Past Brought Into the Light: Breaking Down a U2 Breakthrough, Chord by Chord
headline.print_headline: The Past Brought Into the Light: Breaking Down a U2 Breakthrough, Chord by Chord
headline.seo: ‘From the Sky Down,’ a Documentary About U2 - Review
